title: The Phoney War
description: WW2 begins quietly with little actual fighting, but BBC reporters develop brilliant skills at telling the story of ‘the Phoney War’. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
itunes:subtitle: WW2 begins quietly with little actual fighting: telling the story of ‘the Phoney War’.
itunes:summary: WW2 begins quietly with little actual fighting, but BBC reporters develop brilliant skills at telling the story of ‘the Phoney War’. With Jonathan Dimbleby.
